Buff7_Description: Your Minions have increased Attack Speed.
desc: After you have not taken damage in the last {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} seconds, your Minions gain {c_number}[{SF_1} * 100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed. While you have at least {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} Minions, this bonus is doubled.
name: Kalan's Edict
